definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
lit. chicken feathers and garlic skins (idiom)/fig. trivial (matter)
to wave a chicken feather as a token of authority (idiom); to assume unwarranted authority on the basis of some pretext
pinyin: na2 zhe5 ji1 mao2 dang4 ling4 jian4

definition: a simple inn with only chicken feathers to sleep on

sentences.english: During the war, our army often used letters attached with a chicken feather to deliver important messages.
sentences.chinese: 战争时期我军经常用鸡毛信传递重要信息。

sentences.english: Last week we got into this huge fight over the stupidest thing.
sentences.chinese: 上周我们因为一点鸡毛蒜皮的事大吵了一架。

sentences.english: She often hits the roof because of trifles.
sentences.chinese: 她常为鸡毛蒜皮的小事大发雷霆。

sentences.english: Small things that you do can make a huge impact on the world.
sentences.chinese: 你做的一件鸡毛蒜皮的事也能对世界产生巨大的影响。

sentences.english: He said if I was elected, we’ll all be plucking chickens for a living.
sentences.chinese: 他说如果我当选的话，我们都得靠拔鸡毛为生。

sentences.english: Even trivial things can set Arthur and his wife at loggerheads.
sentences.chinese: 即使是鸡毛蒜皮的小事也能使阿瑟和他妻子吵起来。

sentences.english: My mother tends to chatter over little things.
sentences.chinese: 我妈妈总喜欢因为鸡毛蒜皮的小事碎碎念。

sentences.english: Duck feather chicken feather duck call to frown.
sentences.chinese: 鸭毛鸡愁眉苦脸地给鸡毛鸭打电话。

sentences.english: Talk people tend to fall into a non-trivial quarrel in the long-winded.
sentences.chinese: 议论别人往往陷入鸡毛蒜皮的是非口舌中纠缠不清。

sentences.english: But microblogs in China are not just about trivia.
sentences.chinese: 但中国的微博并不仅仅局限于鸡毛蒜皮的小事儿。

sentences.english: Talking about others will make your trapped in ravelment by trifiles.
sentences.chinese: 议论别人往往陷入鸡毛蒜皮的是非口舌中纠缠不清。

sentences.english: Feather duster is a useful tool for the thorough house-cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 鸡毛掸子是大扫除中一种有用的工具。
不要为这些鸡毛蒜皮的事争吵。

sentences.english: The flowerpots are made by reducing chicken feathers to a powder.
sentences.chinese: 要制造这种花盆，首先把鸡毛弄成粉末。

sentences.english: Chicken Feathers, Stagecoaches and Telephone Lines.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一节鸡毛信，骡车，电话线。
他们在一些鸡毛蒜皮的小事上争吵不休。

definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
erhua variant of 屁眼[pi4 yan3]
